daemon.description: Run a network-connected Plebbit node. Once the daemon is running you can create and start your subplebbits and receive publications from users

plebbitDataPath.name: plebbitDataPath
plebbitDataPath.description: Path to plebbit data path where subplebbits and ipfs node are stored

plebbitRpcApiPort.name: plebbitRpcApiPort
plebbitRpcApiPort.description: Specify Plebbit RPC API port to listen on

ipfsApiPort.name: ipfsApiPort
ipfsApiPort.description: Specify the API port of the ipfs node to listen on

ipfsGatewayPort.name: ipfsGatewayPort
ipfsGatewayPort.description: Specify the gateway port of the ipfs node to listen on

subplebbit:create.description: Create a subplebbit with specific properties. A newly created sub will be started after creation and be able to receive publications. For a list of properties, visit https://github.com/plebbit/plebbit-js#subplebbiteditsubplebbiteditoptions

examples.description: Create a subplebbit with title 'Hello Plebs' and description 'Welcome'

privateKeyPath.name: privateKeyPath
privateKeyPath.description: Private key (PEM) of the subplebbit signer that will be used to determine address (if address is not a domain). If it's not provided then Plebbit will generate a private key

subplebbit:edit.description: Edit a subplebbit properties. For a list of properties, visit https://github.com/plebbit/plebbit-js#subplebbiteditsubplebbiteditoptions

examples.description: Change the address of the sub to a new ENS address
Add the author address 'esteban.eth' as an admin on the sub
Add two challenges to the sub. The first challenge will be a question and answer, and the second will be an image captcha
examples.command: plebbit subplebbit edit mysub.eth --settings.challenges[0].name question --settings.challenges[0].options.question "what is the password?" --settings.challenges[0].options.answer thepassword --settings.challenges[1].name captcha-canvas-v3
plebbit subplebbit edit mysub.eth --title "This is the new title" --description "This is the new description"

address.name: address
address.description: Address of the subplebbit address to edit

sort.name: sort
sort.description: property to sort by (prepend '-' for descending)

filter.name: filter
filter.description: filter property by partial string matching, ex: name=foo

output.name: output
output.description: output in a more machine friendly format

no-truncate.name: no-truncate
no-truncate.description: do not truncate output to fit screen

addresses.name: addresses
addresses.description: Addresses of subplebbits to start. Separated by space

subplebbit:stop.description: Stop a subplebbit. The subplebbit will not publish or receive any publications until it is started again.

addresses.name: addresses
addresses.description: Addresses of subplebbits to stop. Separated by space
